cast.name: 保罗·杰克·卡斯蒂洛 Paul Jake Castillo

introduction: Ram Escaler is a charming and dedicated furniture saleman.He is happily married to his beautiful and loving wife, Charmaine.Despite their seemingly happy relationships, Ram feels the need to prove himself to Charmaine's father and outside the shadow of his own irresponsible father.His great opportunity comes when he becomes the furniture supplier to a high-class luxury resort of the Zalderiaga Group of Companies.This is where he catches the eye of Kara Zalderiaga, a stunning and carefree heiress who gets attracted to him.The sexual tension and physical attraction is apparent that Kara proposes a relationship with no emotional attachment that Ram found irresistible.As Ram succumbs deeper into the affair, he gets torn between the established marriage with his wife and the risque relationship with Kara.Both Charmaine and Kara fight for their love, neither surrendering, claiming their rightful place in Ram's heart.In a world where love becomes a battlefield, each one of them struggle as they face the consequenses of the love they fight for.
